external_games.name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Adventure Volume 1: "Super Special Dreamer #1~#3"

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Adventure Volume 1: Super Special Dreamer 1-3
summary: Description: A new adventure in the Sapphire Waterlands, featuring three brand new quests! Citrin and Spinel take center stage as main characters! Just what will become of the mysterious treasure hunt on the faraway island?
